extendedInfo.description: Spectacular, interactive 3D simulation of the moon, right down to the shadows in the craters and earthshine on the dark side. Touch screen control changes date and time as seen from your location - the moon tracks your every move. One of PC Magazine's 15 Best Nook Tablet Apps."Beautifully presented and strangely compelling." - Greg,   "...looks amazing, and provides excellent information" - Ravi,  "Awesome live wallpaper!" - Troy, "Very cool app with good graphics and intuitive UI." - Seth"This app ... will show you a moon calendar and what the moon phase was or will be for any date between 1900 & 2100. It also shows you tons of other location-based moon data and has some very pretty animations to get the info across. Recommend!" Appolicious - Best Moon Phase Android AppsGreat for: Astronomers - "Great App for all Astronomers and star gazers." - JBStargazers -  "Know the best time to see the stars." - sylvanMoon watchers -  "... great for either moon watching or stargazing." - cameronOutdoor enthusiasts -  "A must have for the outdoorsman"  - Andy  Photographers - "Absolutely great for â¦ planning night photo excursions." - RonGeeks - "If youâre an astronerd this is the app for you!â - NakeishaFeatures:â¶ For any date/location, instantly shows phase, crescent angle, rise/set times, and nearest syzygiesâ¶ Change phase by touchscreen, trackball, or direct date entryâ¶ 2 finger drag rotates the moon: see the far side!â¶ Calendar shows month's phases at a glanceâ¶ Data pane gives additional details: azimuth, altitude, distance, apogee, perigee, transit, and moreâ¶ Share moon image/data via email, Facebook, Google+, Twitter, ...â¶ Fully tablet-optimizedâ¶ Notifications for major phasesâ¶ Live wallpaper â¶ Multiple sizes of widget, most with optional moon info textâ¶ Dynamic shadows of surface features (craters, mountains, etc. - Android 2.2+ only)â¶ SonyEricsson LiveViewâ¢ support (Extends:com.sonyericsson.extras.liveview)â¶ Supports installation to SD card. HOWEVER: doing so will disable the widgets and live wallpaper! This is a "feature" of Android, and isn't something I can fix. See http://bit.ly/icwTHi.

reviews.title: Love it! Perfect app/widget
reviews.comment: Works perfectly. It\'s great for the amateur sky watcher. Best app in the market, app, widget, and lwp, plus every tech info about the moon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly asuch notification as I want.
reviews.comment: It\'s full of information in which I am interested and very easy to use. A good app, totally worth the cost.
reviews.author: Becky Van Wormer

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: If you\'re a moon junkie, you will love this app for all the details and interactivity.  If you\'re not, it\'s still a good app.
reviews.author: T.C. Johnston

reviews.title: Top Notch
reviews.comment: Best moon app!  I have learned a lot over the months I have been using this. I love the widget.   Very easy on the battery.
reviews.author: Artis Mules

reviews.title: Years
reviews.comment: I have had this awesome app for years work great! Very accurate and very happy with it.
reviews.author: nicholas nordone

reviews.title: Could look better
reviews.comment: I like the app for the most part, but it doesn\'t look realistic. It looks more like an old worn baseball.
reviews.author: Stephen Behler

reviews.title: Just brilliant!
reviews.comment: Works perfect on Sony Xperia Z. Gives all the info you need in a fast and simple,way yet extensive. NB: Newcomers learn to rezise your widgets - as it is presented as default the widget takes 1/4 of your screen.
reviews.author: Dryas anne

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Must have for hunters and fisherman!  Also great for women!  I love the live wallpaper and the interactive ability.
reviews.author: Julie Gracie

reviews.title: Excellent App :)
reviews.comment: I kept having problems with the moon phase widgets not showing the correct pictures until I found this app :-) Very well done, & I like the graphics also. Thanks for letting me know that it\'s resizable :-)
reviews.author: Jon Lee

reviews.title: Improved
reviews.comment: Better with recent upgrades.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: I love this being able to watch all the different moon phases & knowing in advance. Kids love it too.
reviews.author: Marta Corner

reviews.title: Its worth the money
reviews.comment: I like this app build by a professional work great work
reviews.author: Maher Ramdan

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Just in case you don\'t want to go outside and look for yourself...
reviews.author: Mike Pollard

reviews.title: My lunar advisor
reviews.comment: Made a vow a long time ago to always be aware of the moon phase. Now I\'m actually doing it. Thanks!
reviews.author: Michael Hudson

reviews.title: fantastic
reviews.comment: love it
reviews.author: Allan Spruell

reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Robert Wideman

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I need this information for my patrol briefs. It is great to have right on my phone.
reviews.author: Shawn Wetzel

reviews.title: EMMY
reviews.comment: beautiful moon .works really well ,no problems at all .I would like to be able to change the size of the moon, but other than that it\'s awesome .
reviews.author: Emile Nolet

reviews.title: Works fine...
reviews.comment: Had this a long time!

reviews.title: Soooo cool. Use it as my wallpaper!
reviews.comment: Great views of the lunar surface.
